title: P1.2: Make startup auto-update truly non-blocking
description: background_update() in server.py calls sync update_database() directly in an async context, blocking the event loop. Wrap in asyncio.to_thread(), add timeout/cancellation handling.

contract.objective: Background DB update never blocks the asyncio event loop
acceptance_criteria: Server tool availability is immediate even during auto-update
constraints: Errors logged but never block server startup
